name: venuelink-monorepo
description: VenueLink monorepo - College event venue booking platform

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev: npm run db:up && concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend

backend/**/*.py: cd backend && poetry run ruff check --fix
